subdivision_of_building: 156 Staines Road will be demolished and 2 x houses will be built in its place. The remaining 6 x houses will be built in the rear gardens of 154, 156 and 158 Staines Road. 154 and 158 Staines Road will each retain a garden.
description: Erection of a two storey dwelling following the demolition of the existing bungalow at 156 Staines Road and the erection of two, two storey buildings in the rear gardens of 154-158 Staines Road to create seven terraced houses incorporating a new access road, car parking, landscaping and refuse and cycle storage (Amended plans)
